it.polimi.se2019.server.model.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.map.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Map class represent the game map. The field mapID refers to the map's configuration (from 1 to 4). Map is made of squares who are divided by rooms. Squares who belongs to a room share the color.
    Author:
    mattiamassarini,merklind,thisisferra.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(int mapID)
        Setter method of the mapID field.
        Parameters:
        mapID - the map id chosen.

    • Method Detail

      • setMapID

        public void setMapID(int mapID)
        Setter of the mapID field.
        Parameters:
        mapID - the unique id of the map. It must be a number greater than 0.

      • getMapID

        public int getMapID()
        Getter of the mapID field.
        Returns:
        the current map id.

      • getAllSquare

        public Square[] getAllSquare()
        Getter of the allSquare field.
        Returns:
        an array of all squares that make the map.

      • setAllSquare

        public void setAllSquare()
        Setter of allSquare field. It sets the map's squares based on the mapID chosen reading the square information from a Json configuration file.

      • setRoomSquare

        public void setRoomSquare()
        Setter of the roomSquare field. It fills the collection with collections of squares, sorted by color. Each list contains the squares that share the same color.

      • searchSquare

        public Square searchSquare(int position)
        It search for a square if the position parameter is valid.
        Parameters:
        position - the number of the square.
        Returns:
        the square required or null if the position is invalid.

      • colorCount

        public int colorCount()
        It counts the number of different colors of the rooms.
        Returns:
        the number of different rooms colors of the map.

      • getRoomSquare

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Square>> getRoomSquare()
        Getter of the roomSquare field.
        Returns:
        the list of lists of squares, sorted by colors.

      • getSpecificSquare

        public Square getSpecificSquare(int indexSquare)
        Parameters:
        indexSquare - the square's index requested.
        Returns:
        the square matching the index requested.

      • toJSON

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject toJSON()
        It saves the map state to a JSONObject object.
        Returns:
        the JSONObject to be restored.

      • resumeMap

        public static Map resumeMap(org.json.simple.JSONObject mapToResume,
                            int chosenMap)
        It restores the Map object from a JSONObject containing information about the map.
        Parameters:
        mapToResume - the JSONObject to be restored.
        chosenMap - the map ID of the JSONObject to be restored.
        Returns:
        the map restored.
